page.title: 03A CHILD IN RIPLEY,DERBYSHIRE
page.content: A DAY IN MY LIFE by VICKY JONES. I woke up at 7 o'clock on Saturday morning.I heard Dad downstairs cooking the breakfast.At 7.30 I dressed and went downstairs.I watched Alice in Wonderland on the video.I took Mum a cup of tea and went to Diane Flemmings for my dance lesson.Later I went weight training at the Rose & Crown.I had lemonade then I went to play with Paul and Tracy who live there.We played Snap then I went back to training.I did 60 leg raises,4 lots of 20 situps,2 lots of twisters,and 4 lots of aeroplanes with 10lbs weights on my fingers.After that I did my jogging.Later,at home,I rode my bike until teatime.After tea I watched T.V. then I went to my Granny's.When we came home I had a drink of coffee and went to bed at 10 o'clock.
